Metadata.title: Portfolio - Full Stack Developer
Metadata.description: Building modern web experiences with Next.js & Modern Tech

About.title: About Me
About.profileDescription: Full Stack Developer with 3+ years experience in React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Workcube and Odoo Framework

Testimonials.title: What People Say
Testimonials.quote1:
Since joining our team, Çağlar has stood out from the very first weeks with his curiosity, fast learning ability, and calm demeanor. He quickly grasps problems, asks the right questions, and strips away unnecessary complexity to present clear and focused solutions. What impressed me was not only his willingness to say 'I don’t know' and ask for help, but also how quickly he shared what he learned with the team and contributed to the project with enthusiasm.

He communicates strongly with product and design teams, clarifies expectations early, and makes potential risks visible. He takes ownership of the tasks he undertakes and delivers on them.

In a short time, he has moved far beyond the ‘junior’ label; today, he is a reliable developer the team can count on. Working with him is a pleasure, and his character is admirable. I wholeheartedly recommend him.
Testimonials.quote2:
I worked with Çağlar on frontend development projects where he demonstrated strong skills in JavaScript, TypeScript, React/Next.js, and Vue.js. Despite being early in his career, he consistently delivered quality code and took ownership of his tasks.

Çağlar built responsive interfaces using Ant Design and TailwindCSS that helped improve our user engagement metrics. He adapted well between different frameworks and actively participated in code reviews, always eager to learn and implement feedback. His contributions to improving our development workflows showed great initiative for a junior developer.

Having studied with Çağlar at Ege University, I know him as a hard-working and dedicated person. He brings this same commitment to his professional work. His technical abilities combined with his positive attitude and willingness to learn made him a valuable team member.

I recommend Çağlar for any frontend developer role. He's a motivated developer with solid skills across multiple frameworks who will continue to grow and contribute effectively to any team.

Globe.flexible: I'm very flexible with time zone communications

Status.current: Currently building Odoo ERP modules & e-pin marketplace

WorkTogether.description: I'd love to hear about it. Let's create something exceptional together.

ProfileCard.title: COLLABORATION
ProfileCard.description: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication

AboutMe.subtitle: MORE ABOUT ME
AboutMe.title: I'm Çağlar, a creative
AboutMe.titleHighlight: Full-Stack Developer and a little bit of everything
AboutMe.description1: I'm Çağlar Çakmak, a proactive full-stack developer passionate about creating dynamic web experiences. From frontend to backend, I thrive on solving complex problems with clean, efficient code. My expertise spans React, Next.js, and Node.js, and I'm always eager to learn more.
AboutMe.description2: When I'm not immersed in work, I'm exploring new ideas and staying curious. Life's about balance, and I love embracing every part of it.
AboutMe.quote: I believe in waking up each day eager to make a difference!

Timeline.mainDescription: My professional journey over the years
Timeline.job1Title: Software Developer @ Çetintaş Bilgi Teknolojileri - Didoda A.Ş.
Timeline.job1Description: Developing scalable Odoo ERP modules fully compliant with Turkish legislation (e-Invoice, e-Archive, e-Waybill). Optimizing complex data structures with Python and PostgreSQL while delivering custom localization and integration solutions for enterprise clients. Specialized in GİB (Revenue Administration) integrations and XML schema management, contributing to digital transformation initiatives across organizations.
Timeline.job2Title: Frontend Developer @ Inovapin - Digital Product Marketplace
Timeline.job2Description: Architected a high-traffic e-pin marketplace from scratch using React and TypeScript, improving page load times by 35%. Designed a modular component library with 20+ reusable UI blocks. Integrated Go-based APIs with TanStack Router.
Timeline.job3Title: Software Developer @ NIK YKS Koçluğu - EdTech Platform
Timeline.job3Description: Built an AI-powered exam preparation platform for university entrance exam students, scaling to 2000+ active users. Implemented live 'Study Room' features via WebSocket to enhance teacher-student interaction. Developed personalized study scheduling and topic tracking AI algorithms, reducing operational workload by 20 hours/week. Delivered high-performance user experience with React-based modern UI and Node.js backend architecture.
Timeline.job4Description: Modernized e-commerce management panels using Vue 3 and TypeScript, achieving a 60% reduction in load times. Resolved critical race conditions and memory leaks. Led code quality initiatives within a 15-person Agile team.
Timeline.job5Description: Developed corporate websites using WordPress and PHP, managing the entire process from design to deployment. Created modern, mobile-responsive solutions supporting companies' digital branding initiatives. Designed responsive HTML newsletter architectures integrated with Mailchimp and compatible with major email clients. Delivered web projects that strengthened clients' digital brand identity.
Timeline.job5Stack: HTML5, SCSS, Responsive Design, Email Testing
Timeline.job6Description: Co-founded a tech startup during university, developing license plate recognition and automated vehicle tracking for Mercedes-Benz Authorized Services. Trained a Computer Vision model detecting 10 defect classes on solar panels (OpenCV, TensorFlow). Led a 12-person software and engineering team, coordinating the entire development lifecycle from ideation to MVP. Gained hands-on experience in business development and technical leadership within the startup ecosystem.
Timeline.job7Description: Developed a corporate website from scratch for a mechatronics company. Built a modern CMS infrastructure using WordPress and PHP, increasing visitor engagement by 30% through SEO optimization and responsive design. Delivered a professional web interface showcasing the company's products and services catalog.

projects.odoo: Scalable Odoo ERP modules 100% compliant with Turkish legislation (e-Invoice, e-Archive, e-Waybill). Complex data structure optimization with Python & PostgreSQL. GİB integrations and XML schema management.
projects.inovapin: High-traffic e-pin marketplace from scratch with React & TypeScript. 35% faster page loads. Go API integration with TanStack Router, 40% reduction in redundant requests.
projects.workcube: Cyprus legislation-compliant ERP development. Enterprise business management solutions with ColdFusion.

projects.edtech: Launched AI-powered exam prep platform scaling to 2000+ users. Real-time 'Study Room' with WebSockets. AI planning algorithms reduced workload by 20hrs/week.

projects.wms: Modernized e-commerce management panels with Vue 3 & TypeScript, achieving 60% load time reduction. Resolved critical race conditions and memory leaks. Led code quality initiatives in 15-person Agile team.

projects.website: Managed design and coding for corporate websites, ensuring pixel-perfect interface integration. Responsive HTML newsletters compatible with major email clients.
Developed corporate website from scratch for mechatronics company. Built modern CMS with WordPress and PHP, increasing visitor engagement by 30%.

projects.ai: Automated vehicle tracking for Mercedes-Benz Authorized Services. Trained Computer Vision model for Solar Panel Defect Detection (10 defect classes). Led 12-person cross-functional team.
